subject: p10439781
raw_find: In comparison with study of, there is little overall change. Substantial cardiomegaly with bilateral opacifications most likely reflecting pulmonary edema. The possibility of supervening pneumonia would have to be raised in the appropriate clinical setting. Central catheter remains in place. Slight impression on the lower cervical trachea on the right could possibly represent a small thyroid mass.
Findings: In comparison with study of, there is little overall change. Substantial cardiomegaly with bilateral opacifications most likely reflecting pulmonary edema. The possibility of supervening pneumonia would have to be raised in the appropriate clinical setting. Central catheter remains in place. Slight impression on the lower cervical trachea on the right could possibly represent a small thyroid mass.
